	Animation Compression Library
- License: "MIT License"
- Online: https://github.com/nfrechette/acl
- Just consisting of headers
- "rtm" - Realtime math library from the author of the animation compression library
	- Directly put into "External\Renderer\acl\rtm" since only used by ACL inside Unrimp
	- License: "MIT License"
	- Online: https://github.com/nfrechette/rtm/
